problem:
99.089.085.092.0
90.074.075.082.0
85.075.064.091.0
72.082.081.094.0 Given the scores 2D array above, which of the following statements can set the highlighted element as 0.0?
scores[2][3] = 0.0;scores[1][2] = 0.0;scores[3][2] = 0.0;scores[2][1] = 0.0;
Explanation
The highlighted element is in the second row of the third column of the 2D array. The row and column index for accessing the element is 1 and 2 respectively. Thus scores[1][2] = 0.0; will set the highlighted element to 0.0.
